0.6.name: wordpress/external-rss-reader
0.6.description:
This is a plugin that allows read some external rss feeds and show it on a page or in a widget. Sites can be categorized and you can add an image or use a gravatar.

Using Plugin:

Add it on a page: [sil_rss:0:content:0] * First Param: 0 - The total of items to show. With 0 uses the number in options. * Second Param: content - Type to show (content or widget or feed). With feed it shows a feed from a site. * Third Param : 0 - Category to show with content or widget. With feed option, it uses this parameter to know the feed.

Sample: [sil_rss:20:content:0] - Show 20 items from all sites. [sil_rss:5:widget:1] - Show 5 items of category 1 like widget. [sil_rss:0:feed:1] - Show number of items defined on options from site 1.

Call function: To show the list calling a function, use: Params are same like before.

List all blogs: To show the list of all blogs on a page, use: [sil_rss_list_blogs] or call it by a function

RSS: Your url to subscrib
